528480.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ultimate NPCs: Skulduggery (5E)
528480.description:
Ultimate NPCs - Skulduggery (5E)

This book was written to be a resource to Game Masters and Players alike. It contains a wealth of information for developing plot points, character behaviors, histories, guilds, and many other valuable assets designed to aid in the running and playing of fantasy role playing games.
This module includes 30 finely crafted NPCs at levels 1, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20 making 180 unique characters with:
  • back stories
  • personality traits
  • role playing cues
  • unique items
  • unique spells
  • Including 8 generic NPCs
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Warren Carlsrud
Updates Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Warren Carlsrud[/b]
Originally Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
